getNumBits¶

zserio.builtin.getNumBits(numValues)[source]¶

Gets the minimum number of bits required to encode given number of different values.

This method implements zserio built-in operator numBits.

Parameters

numValues – The number of different values from which to calculate number of bits.

Returns

Number of bits required to encode numValues different values.

Previous topic

getBitSizeOfVarUInt64

Next topic

convertFloatToUInt16
